Detailed Description

Namespace Class.

Reflect Class.

Description:
Namespaces are used to qualify names into discrete spaces.
API Stability:
Evolving
See also:
EjsNamespace ejsIsNamespace ejsCreateNamespace ejsLookupNamespace ejsDefineReservedNamespace ejsCreateReservedNamespace ejsFormatReservedNamespace
Description:
The Reflect class permits introspection into the type and attributes of objects and properties.
API Stability:
Evolving
